summary.span: 指定 必须将特定的类成员序列化为 XML 元素的数组。

span.span: Specifies that the must serialize a particular class member as an array of XML elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，这些属性控制 序列化或反序列化对象的方式。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization). 你可以将应用 到返回对象数组的公共字段或读/写属性。You can apply the to a public field or read/write property that returns an array of objects. 你还可以将其应用于返回 或任何返回实现接口的对象的字段的集合和字段 。You can also apply it to collections and fields that return an or any field that returns an object that implements the interface. 将应用 到类成员时， 类的方法 会从该成员生成嵌套的 XML 元素序列。When you apply the to a class member, the method of the class generates a nested sequence of XML elements from that member. XML 架构文档 (.xsd 文件) ，表示这样的数组 `complexType` 。An XML schema document (an .xsd file), indicates such an array as a `complexType`. 例如，如果要序列化的类表示采购订单，则可以通过 将应用于返回表示订单项的对象的数组的公共字段，来生成购买项的数组。For example, if the class to be serialized represents a purchase order, you can generate an array of purchased items by applying the to a public field that returns an array of objects that represent order items. 如果没有属性应用于返回复杂或基元类型对象数组的公共字段或属性，则 默认情况下会生成一个嵌套的 XML 元素序列。If no attributes are applied to a public field or property that returns an array of complex or primitive type objects, the generates a nested sequence of XML elements by default. 若要更精确地控制生成的 XML 元素，请将和应用于 字段或属性。To more precisely control what XML elements are generated, apply an and an to the field or property. 例如，默认情况下，生成的 XML 元素的名称派生自成员标识符，可以通过设置属性来更改生成的 XML 元素的名称 。For example, by default, the name of the generated XML element is derived from the member identifier You can change the name of the generated XML element by setting the property. 如果序列化的数组包含特定类型的项和从该类型派生的所有类，则必须使用 来声明每个类型。If you serialize an array that contains items of a specific type and all the classes derived from that type, you must use the to declare each of the types. > [!NOTE] > 您可以 `XmlArray` 在代码中使用，而不是更长的时间 。You can use `XmlArray` in your code instead of the longer . 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例将类实例序列化为包含多个对象数组的 XML 文档。The following example serializes a class instance into an XML document that contains several object arrays. 应用于成为 XML 元素数组的成员。The is applied to the members that become XML element arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定在 XML 文档实例中生成的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the XML element name generated in the XML document instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例将赋值 给两个数组，并序列化包含这些数组的类实例。The following example assigns the to two arrays, and serializes a class instance that contains those arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] [!code-xml[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/Common/MyClass1.xml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置提供给序列化数组的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element name given to the serialized array.

value.span: 序列化数组的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: The XML element name of the serialized array.

value.span: 默认值为向其分配 的成员的名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the member to which the is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望生成的 XML 元素名称与成员的标识符不同，请指定。Specify an when you want the generated XML element name to differ from the member's identifier. 可以将相同的 值设置为多个成员，只要生成的 xml 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分同名成员。You can set the same value to more than one member as long as the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members. 有关使用命名空间并在 XML 文档中创建前缀名称的更多详细信息，请参阅 。For more details about using namespaces and creating prefixed names in the XML document, see . ## Examples 下面的示例对类的实例进行序列化， `Library` 该类包含一个名为 `Books` 的属性，该属性返回项的数组 `Book` 。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains a property named `Books` that returns an array of `Book` items. 该示例使用 属性指定应将 XML 元素的数组命名为 `My_Books` 而不是 `Books` 。The example uses the property to specify that the array of XML elements should be named `My_Books` rather than `Books`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 生成的 XML 元素名称是限定的还是非限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML element name generated by the is qualified or unqualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定 XML 元素名称是限定的还是非限定的。The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified or unqualified. 属性符合名为[XML 中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/)的1999万维网联合会文档。The property conforms to the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium document titled [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/). 如果将 属性设置为任何值，尝试将 属性设置为会 `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` 引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认设置 `XmlSchemaForm.None` 指示 检查 XML 文档的架构，以确定命名空间是否是限定的。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果架构未指定单个元素或属性的值，则将 使用 `elementFormDefault` 和 `attributeFormDefault` 值来确定是否限定了某个元素或属性。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 以下 XML 代码显示了一个架构：The following XML code shows a schema: ``` ``` 当 读取架构时，和的 值 `Name` `Number` 为 `XmlSchemaForm.None` ，但 `Name` 元素是限定的，而元素 `Number` 是非限定的。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类的实例 `Enterprises` 。The following example serializes an instance of the `Enterprises` class. 两个 XML 元素的本地名称 (`Company`) 不同的前缀。Two XML elements have the same local name (`Company`) but different prefixes. 此示例将 属性设置为， `XmlForm.Qualified` 以确保在 XML 实例中出现限定名称。The example sets the property is set to `XmlForm.Qualified` to ensure that the qualified names occur in the XML instance. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将成员序列化为 属性设置为 的 XML 空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档显式通知缺少某个元素的内容。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含将特性 `xsi:nil` 设置为 `true` 。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅名为 [XML 架构第1部分：结构](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)的万维网联合会规范。For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium specification titled [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/). 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则 `xsi:nil` 为已设置为的类成员生成属性 `null` 。If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果将名为的字段设置 `MyStringArray` 为 `null` ，则会 生成以下 XML 代码。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果 属性为 `false` ，则不生成 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 不能将属性应用于 类型为值类型的成员，因为值类型不能包含 `null` 。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例包含两个数组：一个 属性设置为 `true` ，另一个的 属性设置为 `false` 。The following example contains two arrays: one with the property set to `true`, and another with the property set to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML element.
The namespace of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您创建限定的 XML 元素名称。The property allows you to create qualified XML element names. 属性符合用于创建 xml 命名空间的规则，该规则在标题为 xml 中的[命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/)的1999万维网联合会文档中找到。The property conforms to the rules for creating an XML namespace as found in the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium document titled [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/1999/REC-xml-names-19990114/). 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间，必须创建类的实例，该实例 包含 XML 文档中使用的命名空间和前缀。To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 当你为每个设置命名空间时 ，它必须匹配中的一个命名空间 。As you set the namespace for each , it must match one of the namespaces in the . 生成 XML 时，每个数组都以与指定命名空间关联的前缀正确地加上前缀。When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化 `Library` 包含两个成员的类的实例，其中一个成员包含书籍标题，另一个包含期刊标题。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains two members, one that contain book titles, and another that contain periodical titles. 尽管两个 XML 元素都命名为 `Titles` ，但每个元素都包含不同的前缀。Although both XML elements are named `Titles`, each contains a different prefix. 该示例还包括 类的实例，该类包含用于限定两个元素名称的命名空间和前缀。The example also includes an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used to qualify the two element names. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化或反序列化元素的显式顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
The order of the code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 枚举来指示 生成用于设置属性的代码 。Use the enumeration to instruct the to generate code that sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 类型中的一个公共属性或字段上使用该属性后，必须将该属性应用于该类型和所有继承类型的所有公共属性和字段。Once the property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.
